attributes.action: Make all House of Commons Parliamentary votes by secret balot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To often we see MPs voting as instructed along party lines instead of by concience. An MP is often torn between their constituents and their party. The present system of voting does not allow an MP to vote as they may wish without the risk of reprisaal by the whips. If all votes were cast electronically without reference to the MPs name or party we may see a better democratic outcome on many issues.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
